commit message: Fixed some font settings stuff
Added a new dragging layout to the MediaFragment, with the ability to vote, save, and view more options
Fixed navbar tint setting not updating
Changed style of sorting strings
Fixed some bugs, Navigating comments should work all the time now

Merge pull request #1457 from Nxt3/better-settings

Fixed some settings stuff

Merge pull request #1458 from Nxt3/post-stuff

Changed style of sorting strings
Fixed tinting the paragraph text on submission views
Fixed tinting of paragraph in submissions when viewed
Fixed incorrect tinting with subreddit theme color cards
Merged with master
Changed back to tintsecond

Merge pull request #1459 from Nxt3/post-stuff

Fixed tinting of paragraph in submissions when viewed
Fixed short circuit evaluation in CheckInstall

Merge pull request #1460 from Nxt3/cleanup

Fixed short circuit evaluation in CheckInstall
Sidebar now uses comment font size

Merge pull request #1461 from Nxt3/post-stuff

Sidebar now uses comment font size
Changed the UIL config a bit, Some bug fixes
Updated version number
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/ccrama/Slide into new_shadowbox_layout
Made the MediaFragment extend to Vid.me links and Streamable links, Made Album fragment use the new drag layout, Make sub names colored if applicable
Made save button animation work, Slide up panel after clicking upvote, downvote, or save
Fixed a bug with the Donation activity
Added option to use the default system font in Settings > Font
Fixed search querry fields not affecting search
Added the new layout to the SelftextFull and TitleFull fragments, Fixed a few minor bugs
Added a method to apply the AMOLED with contrast theme to darker activities (like Shadowbox and MediaView)
Fixed a logic issue
Made Album and AlbumPager use the new dark theme option

Merge pull request #1466 from ccrama/new_shadowbox_layout

New shadowbox layout
Fix off centre gild icon for items gilded once
Use jitpack for RapidDecoder and ShiftColorPicker

Merge pull request #1469 from Alexendoo/jitpack

Use jitpack for RapidDecoder and ShiftColorPicker
Fixed sorting Search strings

Merge pull request #1471 from Nxt3/post-stuff

Fixed sorting Search strings
Fixed Strings whenever frontpage is in the phrase
Testing layout manager precaching
Updated the OfflineSubreddit model to save on a per-submission basis with the ability to store multiple states of the same subreddit
Save submissions at time of JsonNode creation to save RAM
Switched over to the new OfflineSubreddit model, some speed improvements
Only load with comments if offline
Buffer the loading of the OfflineSubreddit for faster data access
Removed buffering (not a good approach), increased Jackson reading speed
Cache OfflineSubreddit objects for faster retrieval
Fixed the inability to open the last item in a submission list
Added a progressbar to albums while waiting for data
Show dropdown with cached subreddit options while in offline mode in the toolbar, More cache and speed improvements
Added a manage offline content to the offline sidebar, Speed improvements to loading offline content
Added a button to force enter offline mode (even if internet access is avaliable), Fixed submission comments not loading offline
Added the ability to autocache a list of subreddits at a certain time of day in the ManageHistory class
Made autocaching work
Fixed UI locking up
More improvements to the offline saving
Fixed overwriting saved data from the SubredditPosts thread
Made switching to earlier states work when clicking items, Made the toolbar spinner update on page changed, Remove extraneous saved submissions on OfflineSubreddit unsave
Fixed opening cached data from context
AutoCache even while in forced offline mode
Used getString() format
Simplified content filter dialog title
Memory improvements in Shadowbox mode

Merge pull request #1472 from Nxt3/cleanup

Fixed Strings whenever frontpage is in the phrase
Switched away from using SharedPreferences to store data, Now cached submissions are stored in the cache directory as seperate files
Fully switched to the new cache storage system, Reset cachedData SharedPreference if it's booting the first time (fixes memory use and possible ANR)
Fixed offline comments on the new system
Added a modal dialog if backing up while the app is open
Fixed unsaving removing the current submission from the MainActivity view
Testing layout manager precaching
Switched to SQLite to store history rather than SharedPreferences, Switch the SEEN shared pref into the databse on first start after update, Fixes OOM and ANR
New poup with 'Swapping databases'
Made swapping databases not crash
Made history work with the new storage system
Updated the OfflineSubreddit model to save on a per-submission basis with the ability to store multiple states of the same subreddit

Added a button to force enter offline mode (even if internet access is avaliable), Fixed submission comments not loading offline
Added the ability to autocache a list of subreddits at a certain time of day in the ManageHistory class
Made autocaching work
Fixed UI locking up
More improvements to the offline saving
Fixed overwriting saved data from the SubredditPosts thread
Made switching to earlier states work when clicking items, Made the toolbar spinner update on page changed, Remove extraneous saved submissions on OfflineSubreddit unsave
Fixed opening cached data from context
AutoCache even while in forced offline mode
Memory improvements in Shadowbox mode
Switched away from using SharedPreferences to store data, Now cached submissions are stored in the cache directory as seperate files
Fully switched to the new cache storage system, Reset cachedData SharedPreference if it's booting the first time (fixes memory use and possible ANR)
Fixed offline comments on the new system
Added a modal dialog if backing up while the app is open
Fixed unsaving removing the current submission from the MainActivity view
Fixed History not loading
Don't convert if 'SEEN' shared pref is empty

New offline model
Make switching accounts use apply() instead of commit()

Update version number
Fixed duplicate subreddits in the offline sub sidebar
